MS.S: Sample Module with Pipeline scripts and its Plaster template to create a module following some of the community accepted practices.

## [0.118.1] - 2024-07-20_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added extensions.json for vscode_x000D__x000A_- Automatic wiki documentation for public commands._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Update template for SECURITY.md and add it to Sampler repository as well._x000D__x000A_- Built module is now built in a separate folder. This is to split the paths_x000D__x000A_ for the built module and all required modules, to avoid returning duplicate_x000D__x000A_ modules when using `Get-Module -ListAvailable`. The templates already has_x000D__x000A_ this configuration._x000D__x000A_- Now PSResourceGet always default to the latest released version if no_x000D__x000A_ specific version is configured or passed as parameter._x000D__x000A_- Templates was changed to use PSResourceGet as the default method_x000D__x000A_ of resolving dependencies. It is possible to change to the method_x000D__x000A_ PowerShellGet & PSDepend by changing the configuration. Also default to_x000D__x000A_ using PowerShellGet v3 which is a compatibility module that is a wrapper_x000D__x000A_ for the equivalent command in PSResourceGet._x000D__x000A_- Switch to build worker `windows-latest` for the build phase of the pipeline_x000D__x000A_ due to a issue using `Publish-Module` on the latest updated build worker in_x000D__x000A_ Azure Pipelines._x000D__x000A_- Public command documentation has been moved from README.md to the GitHub_x000D__x000A_ repository Wiki._x000D__x000A_- Update order of deploy tasks for the Plaster templates to make it easier_x000D__x000A_ to re-run a deploy phase when a GitHub token has expired._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Update template for module.tests.ps1. Fixes [#465](https://github.com/gaelcolas/Sampler/issues/465)_x000D__x000A_- Now the tasks work when using `Set-SamplerTaskVariable` with tasks that_x000D__x000A_ do not have the parameter `ChocolateyBuildOutput`._x000D__x000A_- Remove duplicate SECURITY.md template files, and fix templates to_x000D__x000A_ point to the single version._x000D__x000A_- Correct description of the parameter `GalleryApiToken` in the build task_x000D__x000A_ script release.module.build.ps1. Fixes [#442](https://github.com/gaelcolas/Sampler/issues/442)_x000D__x000A_- ModuleFast now supports resolving individual pre-release dependencies_x000D__x000A_ that is part of _RequiredModules.psd1_. It is also possible to specify_x000D__x000A_ [NuGet version ranges](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/concepts/package-versioning#version-ranges)_x000D__x000A_ in _RequiredModules.psd1_, although then the file is not compatible with_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet or PSDepend (so no fallback can happen)._x000D__x000A_- Now it won't import legacy PowerShellGet and PackageManagement when_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet or ModuleFast is used._x000D__x000A_- Now it works saving PowerShellGet compatibility module when configured._x000D__x000A_- Now if both ModuleFast and PowerShellGet compatibility module is configured_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet is automatically added as a dependency. This is for example_x000D__x000A_ needed for publishing built module to the gallery._x000D__x000A_- Update pipeline so build not fail.
Sample Module with Pipeline scripts and its Plaster template to create a module following some of the community accepted practices.

## [0.118.1] - 2024-07-20_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added extensions.json for vscode_x000D__x000A_- Automatic wiki documentation for public commands._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Update template for SECURITY.md and add it to Sampler repository as well._x000D__x000A_- Built module is now built in a separate folder. This is to split the paths_x000D__x000A_ for the built module and all required modules, to avoid returning duplicate_x000D__x000A_ modules when using `Get-Module -ListAvailable`. The templates already has_x000D__x000A_ this configuration._x000D__x000A_- Now PSResourceGet always default to the latest released version if no_x000D__x000A_ specific version is configured or passed as parameter._x000D__x000A_- Templates was changed to use PSResourceGet as the default method_x000D__x000A_ of resolving dependencies. It is possible to change to the method_x000D__x000A_ PowerShellGet & PSDepend by changing the configuration. Also default to_x000D__x000A_ using PowerShellGet v3 which is a compatibility module that is a wrapper_x000D__x000A_ for the equivalent command in PSResourceGet._x000D__x000A_- Switch to build worker `windows-latest` for the build phase of the pipeline_x000D__x000A_ due to a issue using `Publish-Module` on the latest updated build worker in_x000D__x000A_ Azure Pipelines._x000D__x000A_- Public command documentation has been moved from README.md to the GitHub_x000D__x000A_ repository Wiki._x000D__x000A_- Update order of deploy tasks for the Plaster templates to make it easier_x000D__x000A_ to re-run a deploy phase when a GitHub token has expired._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Update template for module.tests.ps1. Fixes [#465](https://github.com/gaelcolas/Sampler/issues/465)_x000D__x000A_- Now the tasks work when using `Set-SamplerTaskVariable` with tasks that_x000D__x000A_ do not have the parameter `ChocolateyBuildOutput`._x000D__x000A_- Remove duplicate SECURITY.md template files, and fix templates to_x000D__x000A_ point to the single version._x000D__x000A_- Correct description of the parameter `GalleryApiToken` in the build task_x000D__x000A_ script release.module.build.ps1. Fixes [#442](https://github.com/gaelcolas/Sampler/issues/442)_x000D__x000A_- ModuleFast now supports resolving individual pre-release dependencies_x000D__x000A_ that is part of _RequiredModules.psd1_. It is also possible to specify_x000D__x000A_ [NuGet version ranges](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/concepts/package-versioning#version-ranges)_x000D__x000A_ in _RequiredModules.psd1_, although then the file is not compatible with_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet or PSDepend (so no fallback can happen)._x000D__x000A_- Now it won't import legacy PowerShellGet and PackageManagement when_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet or ModuleFast is used._x000D__x000A_- Now it works saving PowerShellGet compatibility module when configured._x000D__x000A_- Now if both ModuleFast and PowerShellGet compatibility module is configured_x000D__x000A_ PSResourceGet is automatically added as a dependency. This is for example_x000D__x000A_ needed for publishing built module to the gallery._x000D__x000A_- Update pipeline so build not fail.
